vision.get_points_from_disk¶

vision.get_points_from_disk(filename)[source]¶

Get a list of points in form (x, y) from saved file

Parameters

  • filename (str) – filename to save list to

  • input_list (list) – list of points to save

Examples

Calculate facial landmarks on an image and write to disk, then load it back into another list

cloudburst
